flawed_nl_solution:
The rancher would have sold his cattle for $204000/340 = $<<204000/340=600>>600 per head.
He was left with a remainder of 340 - 172 = <<340-172=618>>618 head of cattle.
The lowered price is $600 - $150 = $<<600-150=450>>450 per head.
He would make $450 x 618 = $<<450*618=278100>>278100 at the lowered price.
He could have made $600 x 618 = $<<600*618=370800>>370800 at the original price.
He would lose $370800 - $278100 = $<<370800-278100=92700>>92700

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 168, not 618. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
